abstract: Catapulted by the biggest initial public offering in American history, Visa shares soared 28 percent in their stock market debut on Wednesday as investors bet an accelerating shift to electronic payments will enrich the company.
lead_paragraph: Catapulted by the biggest initial public offering in American history, Visa shares soared 28 percent in their stock market debut on Wednesday as investors bet an accelerating shift to electronic payments will enrich the company.
